Menu.name: Cheeseburger
Menu.moreinfo: A juicy grilled beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce on a sesame seed bun.

Menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
Menu.moreinfo: A classic pepperoni pizza with mozzarella cheese and our house-made marinara sauce on a crispy crust.

Menu.name: Chicken Nuggets
Menu.moreinfo: Tender white meat chicken nuggets, breaded and fried to a golden crisp. Served with your choice of dipping sauce.

Menu.name: Fries
Menu.moreinfo: Crispy golden French fries with a sprinkle of sea salt. Perfect as a side or a snack.

Menu.name: Veggie Wrap
Menu.moreinfo: A fresh wrap filled with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and bell peppers, topped with hummus and wrapped in a whole-grain tortilla.

Menu.name: Chocolate Milkshake
Menu.moreinfo: A creamy, rich chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream and a cherry.
